document.full_text: a federal judge limited the potential financial liability facing the operator of limewire, a once-popular file-sharing service found liable for copyright infringement, at an upcoming damages trial.
document.title: limewire wins limit on damages to record labels
lines_and_colors: a federal judge limited the potential financial liability facing the operator of limewire, a once-popular file-sharing service found liable for copyright infringement, at an upcoming damages trial.
